title: OK type place
review: an easy trek of about 1/2 km get you to this place. good view of the vally from here. Rappling & rock climbing is done here.

title: View from Mukteshwar
review: It is a bit touristy. And is in the same location as the Chauli Ki Jali temple. But the odd rock formations, jutting out of the ground - almost turning into a seat of sorts that alllows you to look down at the breath taking view of the Valley. If your are silent, and its a peaceful day you can hear the barking deer calling out to each other. The scenery and the wide sky is beautiful. You can enjoy it over a cup of local tea and maggi. The music, number of people however can be a distraction.

title: Great place Great Views
review: Go with your family to take some great pictures and have a nice walk. The Views are good and the maggi is on point.

title: Average Place
review: Since Mukteshwar doesnt not offer many sight seeing so this place it must to visit . There is a Lord Shiva Temple , you can do adventure sports here as well like, ziplining, cycle track etc.

title: nice veiw!!
review: This is very near to famous Lord shiva temple of Mukteshwar.

title: Nothing great
review: This is an over hyped place and not worth the effort you put into going. Just a part to walk on leading to the temple. Avoid.

title: Beautiful place with a spiritual belief
review: From the Himalyan view point or mukteshwar temple, it is a short walk to chauli ki jali. It is the hole in the cliff that is referred to as jali. There is a religious belief that on shivratri if a lady wishing for a child crosses this jali, they will be blessed with a kid. Our guide kindly showed us how it is done but unfortunately I can’t post the video here. Beautiful views and a lovely spiritual place. You can also enjoy kadi chawal or rajma chawal or maggi or chai at nearby stalls

title: Vacation time
review: A perfect places to visit in Muskteshwar. Highest place from where you can see complete city, Himalayan ranges (People of Muskteshwar believe) and lots of wild animals. If you are lucky you will see Tiger but we did not saw. You will see other wild life like birds and animals. Animals like different type of monkey, fox, some other animals.

title: Mesmerising view
review: We went here right after our darshan in mukteshwar temple- lord of shiva. It has mesmerising view. Very peaceful.

title: Amazing View point
review: This location is really amazing. View from this location was mesmerising. We did a rock climbing there and it was worth it. this was my first time and I will always remember that day.

title: Amazing mountain view with adventure activities
review: Its located just below Mukteshwar temple. The mountain view from here is mesmerizing. Here you can find activities like Zip Lining. From here one can take a guided hiking route to reach Mukteshwar temple which is worth the climb (Not suggested for old people and small children.) There are food stalls also where one can enjoy maggi, rajma chawal or kadhi chawal.

title: an attraction
review: In hill station some places are just for visit and here you can climb on rock or manual cable car ride so just for time pass.

title: valley view
review: Its around `15 min trek from the main road and is a long cliff with beautiful view of the villages in the valley. Dont forget to spot the local lizards/chameleons there on the rocks. There are maggi and juice points there. Maggi was nice. The area also has small adventure area with a zipping line, mountain climbing and tree climbing. If you wish to you can give it a try. There are no guides here but when you are taking a tea or a maggi halt the vendors will tell you the history. There is a small hole in the rocks where in if women who are not getting pregnant pass through on a specific day are sure to have a baby. This local legend is believed in very strongly.  Next to this attraction is the Mukteshwar temple.

title: Ultimate place
review: excellent valley view and better to go in the late afternoon so that you can see the sun set. you can also do rock climbing.

title: Amazing Point
review: We hired a guide for just rs.200=00.He guided us through small trek through the left of the temple complex to chauli ki jali.At the  start of the walk the locals were selling food items like kidney beans rice and Kadi rice.One plate for just rs.50=00.The small trek is through a dense forest.As we reach the rocks,the view is amazing of the snow covered ranges in the front.On the left are  densely covered hills.Down below is the valley.One adventure activity consisting of ropes are also arranged there.But its avoidable.Because its quite rudimentary.Area has been kept v clean.

title: Himalayas view
review: This place lies at around 200 metres walk down from the Mukteshwar temple.The walk lies in between cedar and green oak trees which is a great view.From the place you can see a view of the valley which is magnificent and Himalayas and the major peaks.its good to have a guide there and he can tell you the name of the peaks there as well . He will show you zero point as well from where you can see panoramic view of the snow capped Himalayas at a nominal charge of 250 bucks.You can go by car as well to the zero point. Chali ki jali has small Maggi stalls and chai and soda shops to chill at the top.Also , there are adventurous activities available like valley crossing , zip line, rock climbing.

title: Stunning view and very picturesque.
review: If you happen to land here during a clear sunny sky - give your eyes a treat and wait till the sunset. It is beautiful. And getting those pictures clicked by sitting(safely) on those cliffs is another bonus. A must see even if you are just passing mukteshwar.

title: Nice view in Sun shine
review: Excellent mountain and valley view.  Few adventurous activities are available like valley crossing,  rock climbing.

title: Hyped place
review: There is not many places to go in Mukteshwar. If the weather is clear then one can have a great view. Overall it seemed to be hyped.

title: Mesmerising view
review: Behind Mukteshwar Mahadev mandir there is a road through forest, which will bring u directly to this point. No need to take guide, it’s easy reachable. View is great here, especially in the morning, very peaceful and beautiful place

title: The view point at Chauli ki Jali is rugged and rustic
review: Superb views of the valley and the various Himalayan peaks can be enjoyed from this place. Sadly though the tourists who visit the place spoil the serenity and natural beauty by their banter and the littering. We saw police personnel inspecting the place, but probably they are more focused on the safety of tourists, which is understandable and appreciated. If the locals are trained to ensure that the tourists do not litter, probably the natural beauty of this place can be better preserved.

title: Splendid view !!
review: This places lets you witness a splendid view of the hills as it's on the top, Cool breeze, few adventure activities and mesmerizing view. Overall it was an wonderful experience.

title: Beautiful view of mountain
review: Perfect places to visit in Muskteshwar. Highest place from where you can see complete city.You can also enjoy some adventure sport here like zipline, rock climbing and archery.

title: Family trip
review: Tremendous experience. Hidden jem. It's a great experience to go in mukteshwer. Natural environment.

title: Beautiful location and a good adventure time
review: An exxellent view point espaxialpy at the eveing. Rock clinbing adds the view point and make an excitement for adventure at hills .

title: Nice view but can be avoided in monsoons
review: Its famous for sun set and sun rise. Since it was rainy season we cud not see either. But its a nice place to see the entire mountain range. How much you enjoy there all depends on the moods of the sky. A beautiful sunset while sitting on the rocks can make the visit worth.

title: An amazing place to catch the sunset and enjoy some adventure sports.
review: A short trek from the main road leads you to this famous place where people believe that their prayers do get answered. Besides that it’s a beautiful spot to sit and watch the sunset on a clear day of course and enjoy a hot cup of tea with some yummy maggi. You could also enjoy some adventure sport like rock climbing. Ask for Kundan. He is your go to man for the adventure sports.

title: Quiet peak with practically 360 degree view of Himalaya
review: Had already read so much about this place in Jim Corbett's book 'ManEaters of Kumao',we were aware that we would be visiting the place almost 78 years since! When we arrive, that too not in right time- as it is a bit hot in May in Mukteshwar, however we were pleasantly surprised that the place still commands the best view in Kumao. Unexploited, comparatively clean, very close to the RVI and  famous Inspection Banglow... It is worth visiting... There are few adventure sports being offered by local youth... good initiatives...

title: Awesome View
review: This is a beautiful place. Gets crowded though in season. But the weather was amazing. If you are adventurous, do try ziplining.

title: Popular Rock Side with Meadow View
review: It is a famous spot for rock/tree climbing, zip-line, para-gliding, archery and a sacred cliff (dedicated to Lord Shiva).

title: Good Place to take Pics & have Maggi
review: Its a small walk from Mukteshwar temple. Very scenic with fresh air which can make you feel good. PLease also expect too much rush which can be a spoiler. There were some adventure sports there which was mainly for kids. All in all a good place to visit during sunset

title: See it to believe it
review: Only 250 meters walking distance from the parking area of the Mukteshwar Temple. The walk was thrilling as the sun was going to set and we needed to hurry as we are on our way to Binsar which  is around 65 Km from Mukteshwar. There are adventure enthusiasts hanging from the famous rock formation and people are taking snaps of themselves. You will be spell bound seeing the rock formation and obviously hire a local guide to explain about the rock formation, trees, the story behind Chauli Ki Jali and on our way back he may guide you through the pine forest just behind the temple. Awesome view and must see place at Mukteshwar .

title: Amazing
review: Photographic locations and amazing views... You may find inner peace and inner self sitting on the cliff if you don't find crowd.

title: Waste of Time No view
review: Amazing how people review this place as nice.. its totally waste of time noting no view..please guys don't go

title: MUST WATCH
review: Take a guide for  better understanding.

title: Nice View
review: Great Place to visit especiallly at night if you are ready to take new challanges. Nice view at night & trecking in jungle.

title: Wow.. Raw nature for you..
review: Amazing serene beauty of nature. Away from city's hush hush in a peaceful paradise.. Must visit.. Better spend some time and enjoy it thoroughly.

title: Fabulous place.
review: Visited the ancient temple of Muktheshwar dham. Advise to take a guide for the jhaal, forest track and temple.

title: Enjoyable tour of Mountains
review: It was a wonderful experience, visiting Chauli Ki Jali. When you reach at top, the whole view is breathtaking. Cool air on the top. Its worth seeing.

title: Photographers Delight
review: It's a scenic spot, where you get to view the steep valleys, view of Almora city from here post evening is like stars twinkling on the earth.

title: Excellent view
review: Guide shown us a big hole in the top of the rocks with folk stories.. we did not dare to go that up.. but the view from the rocks was mesmerizing

title: Panoramic views
review: An amazing spot which takes some walking to reach but worth it. Quite a few photo options, with some adventure sports peddlers around for the strong hearted

title: Worth the hype
review: Nice fifteen to twenty minutes trek and the view from the top is really really nice. Definitely recommended

title: Limestone cliff
review: Get Perfect view of mukteshwar from these cilffs.but one shud b careful from not getting slipped down.

title: Must visit
review: Not too crowded

title: Nice
review: Only place to go  in mukteshwar

title: Nice view n picturesque spot in Mukteshwar
review: The place is known as chauli ki jali..some says there was fight between godess n rakshas n some say different story...but you can visig this place for valley view n cliff pic..pics on the cliff are awsome.

title: Best view of Himalaya
review: Its a kind of sightseeing. Perfect to be in evening time to gaze best view of sunset and valley. You may do a picnic here or like click random clicks of Himalayan beauty. The ways is 700 to 800 meters from main Mukteshwar square

title: Chauli  ki  jali
review: It is a MUST if one visits Muktheswara .unless u go to the edge u do not know what u miss .the scene takes ur breath away .one has to b careful though as there is  no protection .it is nature as it is! the forest walk from the temple to get to this place is also interesting- enjoyed by children .

title: Adventure & Religious
review: Visit the Mukteshwar temple and then come to the place for the magnificent view and some good adventure activities

title: Nice view point
review: The point gives nice spectacular view of the hills and valley. Must visit place. Be careful for your safety while opting for sports

title: Awesome
review: Awesome..breathtaking...fabulous!

title: Adventure
review: That place is close to Mukteshwar Temple. Good place for adventure sports. You need to be careful in around that area.

title: Geological Formation
review: This is on the right side of the temple.It is a geological formation and it oversees the valley giving a beautiful view which is enjoyable.Walk thru the forest after crossing this formation and reach the temple

title: Hole in mountain
review: The English meaning of the chauli ki jali is, hole in mountain. This actually a cliff of a mountain just behind the Mukteshwar temple. The scenic beauty of the place is very attractive and a perfect place for nature lover.

title: Simply Amazing !!!! A background to kliks as many as you wish to...
review: Chauli ki jali is mainly famous among locals for hole in the mountains and have local tradition connected to it. What you get at this location is awesome place to kliks photos standing right on the edge of mountains.

title: Awesome view
review: Trek only for 300 mts from the gate of Mukteshwar Dham temple and you are there. Awesome 280 degree view of Himalayas. Few adventure activities like Rope sliding is also there through local people. Enjoy the beauty by spending few hours. Feel the pure air. A great experience.

title: Sunset point in Mukteshwar
review: This is a nice place to enjoy the day's end in Mukteshwar. From KMVN resthouse a short trek through the oak & rhododendron forest will take you to Chauli ki Jali.

title: Great view point !!!
review: From here you can get the panoramic view of whole muktesshwar region with Himalaya that is amazing. This place is highly recommended to visit.

title: Place with a beautiful view.
review: I learnt that trekkers often visit this place. While it looks rather dangerous to climb on those beautiful yet sharp and different shaped rocks, its a guarantee that you will have a memorable experience here. From the main road (parking), you will have to start walking upwards. There is a very old shiva temple which also makes you feel comfortable if you feel tired. From shiva temple, its a 10-15 mins walk to this landmark.Once you reach here, do spend some time without talking (personal experience) since this place is very quite (if not too crowded), and offers lot of peace, specially to those who are from metro cities.

title: Nice views but over rated!!
review: U have to walk 300/400 meters to get to the top - where there is a hole in the rock - view is nice but very much over rated n too crowded!!! Just relax in mukteshwar!!

title: Good place to visit
review: Great if you love trekking. Requires walking so be prepared for that. Nice location and view. nearby temple is worth a visit.

title: Geological formations
review: Located near the Mukteshwar Dham temple, these geological rock formations are a must visit when visiting Mukteshwar. The attractions offers great views of the valley below as well as nearby peaks. It also offers adventure activities conducted by locals.

title: Visit to Chauli Ki Jali
review: We got excellent weather during our visit . Amazing place in middle of nature . There was a guy playing music there that added to the environment . Also there were adventure activities that would have loved to take but had shortage of time . Had a great time in the sun there admiring beauty of nature .

title: Place not to leave
review: Love it.

title: Lovely view
review: Beautiful views , kids realy loved it. We saw some people doing zip lining..i hope its fun, we will do it next time for sure

title: Attractive  Place
review: This on is good place for visit.Here is guided tour is necessary for see Chauli ki Jali.The formation of rock is good and unique.

title: Adventure activities at Chauli ki Jali
review: The rock formations at the place are a must visit when visiting Mukteshwar. It is located near the Mukteshwar Dham temple. The place offers numerous adventure activities like Zip lining and rock climbing.

title: Very Good Place
review: Mind blowing place to visit. View is very very good. One must visit this place , at the time of visit of Mukteshwar.

title: Lovely place
review: Calling it heaven is an understatement of the beauty of this place. Full of peace, calmness and tranquility, this place is a must visit.

title: Must Visit while your tour to Mukteshwar
review: Enjoy here with valley views and Himalayan view covered with snow. Must Visit while your tour to Mukteshwar

title: Beautiful view but little crowded
review: I visited the place with my wife but same was very crowded. I would suggest to better go to kmvn guest house which is 5 minutes walk.

title: Nature at its best
review: Nature at its best ...Enjoyed Rapling and other Adventure based  sports at reasonable costs. Must try for adventure lovers

title: Totally a breathtaking place to sit and enjoy the view
review: This is the very spot from where you can relish into the view of green Himalayas to the snow-capped five prominent peaks including the Nanda Devi, Pancha Chuli and more.

title: Beautiful views!
review: This place offers unmatched views of the Kumaoni hills!  Must visit if you're in Mukteshwar. You'll have to park your car and trek to reach here.

title: Exploring kumaon himalayas
review: Visited this place couple of times during Feb. The place displays a very unique shade in morning and evening hrs (very scenic if the sky is clear) and both are worth more than million words. The mesmerizing landscape and the beautiful views of deep valleys are not only a treat to your eyes also it can bring out the true nature lover out of you.

title: Nice place to visit
review: This is a great adventure sports spot and the view from here is really great. The valley is the deepest valley I have seen in person. It's close by a famous temple. Good place to visit for adventure as well as spiritual focussed traveller s.

title: Himalaya’s view with historic
review: “Even after all this time the sun never says to the earth, 'You owe me.' Look what happens with a love like that. It lights the whole sky” -

title: Amazing
review: Offers a great view....Must visit....a lot of viewing points......Try to go down by the different route in the right down....

title: Good place to visit
review: For the adventurous and religious , you can find peace , serenity in this trek. This place does involve climbing stairs so be prepared for walking and trekking. Nearby a nice shiv temple and adventure activities. Must visit.

title: Excellent views
review: Must visit place if one is in Mukteshwar. The place offers excellent view of the valley and photo opportunity.

title: Scary rock formations..
review: This can be accessed by a walk-in pathway, which starts adjacent to the Mukhteshwar Temple. The views of the valley are fine and scary, the rock formations worth seeing. No attempt has been made by the Govt to set up barricades etc, so it may be easy for suicidal people for a quick jump into oblivion. A similar fate awaits those who venture too near to the edge of the cliff.

title: a very high cliff
review: the view  of valley is amazing .. its a steep fall of almost 100-200 mtrs .. if u see will twit your mind ... good place for adventures activities.. but sadly hardly anyone here is organising such activities ..

title: Blissful experience of Temple & Nature
review: A must visit place for someone visiting Mukteshwar. Even if one is not religious in nature, it offers excellent valley view. And if nature is good to you, you will be walking among the clouds while you are here. Step outside the temple and one has adventure sports, cliff to hang on and get some good pics to remember.

title: Too much hype - but a nice walk
review: Its a rock with a hole - something like "POLO" or "MINTO"!

title: Short 200 Mtrs walk through nature trail
review: Beautiful quiet place....an easy walk through the woods. Its a high place overlooking the valley. You can walk further to the temple, another 500 mtrs ahead.

title: Adventure trip
review: Located in main mukteshwar near mukteshwar temple. Scenic view with adventure activities( rappling , climbing, zip line). Temple is located at the top of hill.

title: Holiday
review: Nothing great and disappointed. Only some view of the town below.it was crowded .not  a great place.......one time visit only

title: Kids Activity Zone
review: This is just beside Mekteshwar Dham Temple. Basically a cliff providing wide valley view on a sunny day. This place is popular among kids due to various activities like

title: Awesome View
review: Quite peace if no crowd and lovely place to enjoy the scenery. Lovely scene of mountain and valleys.

title: One of the best Himalayan View Point
review: Just came back from mukteshwar yesterday , and this places was mesmerizing.  Amazing view of mountains ranges , valley , all green forest. and a point for adventure activities.. It also give a lot of options for adventure activities like zip line, rope climbing, rock climbing , rappelling , archery etc.

title: Amazing
review: Nice place for some adventure sport. Chai paani to relax on way to Mahadev Temple. Beautiful scenery.

title: Chauli Ki Jali (Sunset Point)
review: Chauli Ki Jali (Sunset Point) is a 10mins walk from the temple. Don’t miss on this one. You cab sit here all day the {if weather allows} and gaze into beautiful mountains.

title: Breathtaking view
review: So, this is where most of the tourists gather. As it is near the temple and Adventure activities are organised here. While my brothers try enthusiastically went for the Flying fox activity that happens at a height of 2000ft. As a traveller and photographer i was enthralled by the view. The Mountains and Valleys look spectacular from this point.

title: Amazing valley view
review: the place is silent, serene and has many activities to be done. Food is not very good but it is not the place to eat. it is sight seeing spot with an adventrous walk of 250 mt where kids have to be careful. Must visit

title: Nothing special, only a peak view!!
review: Went with lots of expectation, however not much to cheer!! You can have a good view of the entire Mukteshwar valley from this place with some adventure sports offerings (though not much).

title: Amazing place to have a view of several hill in nanital
review: 1. Amazing view from top , few activities also available.

title: Small trek good view
review: Its a small walk up the hill. We could do ot with a 2.5 year old kid. But old members of the trip couldnot climb up.

title: Nice picnic spot
review: Considering it is one of the few sightseeing places available in Mukteshwar, it is a good picnic spot. You can direct walk from the road, or take a small 200mtr trek from the KMVN guest house to reach there. The place offers a 360 degree view of the Himalayan range. Once on top, you will find Maggie points that serve Maggie, cold drinks and chips etc. Apart from that there are Archery, flying fox and rock climbing activities there.

title: A place for nature lovers...
review: It's just beside the temple and a 10.minute walk.. A normal walk,  no climb.. You can view the Himalayan ranges but only on a clear day.. Preferably after September... But still a nice place to take pics and selfies.. There is some. Adventure sport also.. Flying fox and a free fall... Just go there for the weather and maggi

title: Breathtaking Geographical Formation !!
review: This is one rock formation,which you would seldom come across anywhere in India.

title: Top of the Cliff
review: The place is unusual because it gives a wide view of the Himalayas against the setting sun which is beautiful. The cliff is a good Vantage point for portrait photographs.

title: Summer vacation
review: It was nice view there with rope climbing and other fun activities there. You can stay there a little while and explore the place. Nice valley view

title: Nice place to visit
review: I went there with friends and kids in May. It was sunny but not hot. There is a temple also nearby but didnt go there. You have to walk a little/climb stairs to reach both places - the temple and the cliff. I chose to go to the cliff only. This place offers scenic beauty and some action like zip lining, rope ladder climbing and archery (last for kids). There is a small shop of lemonade and Maggi - a must try as both are different and delightful. The lemonade is not prepared with usual small lemons but with big local lemons available in limited shops; i wanted to buy those but couldn't find anywhere.

title: Great place to be
review: A well stablished tourist place, situated next to the temple. Did not try the rapping but should have been great.

title: Good Place to Hang Around & Spend Some time
review: The Place is full of Views, Adventure Activities and Food Stalls. The food is basic but good. Adventure sports can entertain you for an hour and you can spend some time gazing into the valley for some real good views.

title: Overcowded
review: Nice views, but the place is overcrowded which takes away the charm. There are adventure sports there like rappelling, rope ladder, zip line, etc.

title: Amazing place
review: Its an amazing place..I went there with my five friends and it was our memorable trip.We will never forget this trip.It was amazing like heave.

title: Beautiful place
review: It's a cliff near mukteshver temple gives amazing view of sun set,valley you can sit here and enjoy cool breeze or can do some sports activities after this tracking towards temple is real fun.

title: Excellent view
review: Excellent view and best place to take photographs. But not meant for small kids or elderly people. Rope activities also available. Must visit

title: Treacherous trek leading to a wonderful experience
review: 10 minutes trek ( 1st half is concrete and 2nd half raw) starts from left of Mukteshwar temple. At places trek is risky esp for aged and those with very young kids below walking age.

title: Sunset viewing spot
review: Nice place for selfies on rocks extending from the cliff, also a great sunset viewing spot. Option for zip lining also available here. Combine a visit here with the mukteshwar dham temple.

title: Excellent view
review: This is the main tourist attraction of Mukteshwar and lives upto its worth. The view from here is mesmerising. One can also indulge in daring adventure activities like zip-lining which certainly is not for the faint-hearted like me. Archery, shooting etc. are available for kids. Chauli ki jali is a constituent of a superb forest walk starting from the mukteshwar temple. A guide can be a help who can explain the intricacies of each of the spots on the way but the unobtrusive kind can do away with one and explore the way by himself or herself ! This is one of the highest points in the mukteshwar area at 8000 feet.

title: Casa Dream Stay visited Chauli ki jali
review: Lovely valley view from this location, beautiful and serene view. Nearby Shiv Temple I was told is over 360 year old.

title: Near the Temple
review: Good place to enjoy with family as it has a great view of the valley with some games being organised by locals which one can enjoy with friends

title: Nice tourist spot
review: I like adventure spots, this place has great rock climbing facilities. And amazing views. Nice height cliff

title: Beautiful place to visit
review: One of the few beautiful places in Mukteswar. On your way to Mukteswar temple, this place is present. It provides a panoramic view of the underlined valley. The view is mesmerizing. Also, there is section where you can sit and enjoy the great environment.

title: Great Views
review: Chauli ki jaali is a place much revered among the locals. It is situated at walking distance from Mukteshwar temple and if you are visiting Mukteshwar temple then this is a must visit. You can hire a guide from the footsteps of the temple and visit chauli ki jaali, take a short trek amidst the jungle , visit the temple and thus complete the circumference. This place offers some of the best views and it would be the top attraction of your whole trip.

title: Place of Mountain Adventure Activities
review: This place is famous for mountain adventure type activities which includes climbing rocks etc. It also offers view of the Himalayas.

title: Nothing Special
review: Nothing special was there. Rock Climbing and crossing are good. Sight is good too but nothing else was there to do.

title: Phot click point
review: Mukteshwar has very few tourist place to explore. One is chauli ki jali and other one is mukteshwar mahadev temple which is adjacent and 5 min walk from Chauli ki jali. So rather than staying 1 night at mukeshwar, it is advisable to explore this place on day trip from nainital or enroute your return journey from binsar or almora towards delhi or kathgodam.

title: Short trek but a beautiful experience
review: We availed of the services of a guide to show us the short track route, he regaled us with a lot of local stories and showed us the rocks that have a deposit of mica and hence the shiny surfaces. An average person who has no trekking experience can also easily do a round walk around this place and around the old temple.

title: Weekend Getaway
review: Good place to hangout especially if you love adventure sports and outdoors photography. If you are in luck can observe Eagle's gliding free for long time below your level.

title: Great view and offers some nice snacks options
review: Try maggi, tea, hukka and get photographs clicked. Offers nice sun set point provided the sky is clear.

title: Top of the world!
review: One of those few places to visit when in Mukteshwar. A nice trek and you will feel awesome and on the top of the world after reaching the destination.

title: Great place for adventure activities.
review: Great place for adventure activities. Went on the zip line, ladder climbing, archery and had lots of fun. Must go if you are there.

title: Good View point but getting dirty
review: Why do we have to have bloody Maggi pints everywhere in the hills, i mean does everyone want to eat Maggi everywhere in hills?

title: Great view
review: Very close to KMVN and IVRI, this is the only touristy place in mukteshwar. Nothing much to do here, except clicking some photos. Adventure lovers can go for rapelling and all. But all looks artificial here. I dint find anything great here, except the view. Try catching a glimpse of huge falcons that fly at that height (looks amazingly grand and beautiful). Come in a group to enjoy more.

title: The view was very awesome
review: The view was great and its one of the few places to see in Muktehwar besides the temple. There are a few street vendors selling local dishes which is worth a try. riving self to this places from North side is bit difficult but driving from south side is easier

title: Serene and breath taking...
review: This is our favorite hangout when we are in Mukteshwar. Awesome place to spend time with your friends and have fun!!

title: Awesome view, great place to visit
review: It's a lovely place to cover when you are visiting Mukteshwar or Nainital. It has an awesome view.

title: Nice place as a sight seeing
review: We visited Chauli ki Jali on 15 April, 2017. It is having a devi temple, a very nice view of himalayan mountains. Nice scenic beauty. A lot of activities are also there like Ziplining, Rapelling, Rock Climbing etc. Very interesting to do. Fun for kids and adults.

title: Nice place for sight seeing
review: This place has very good natural view of the valley. You need to walk to this place as it's bit far from the road and vehicle will not go till this place. Always good to trek some distance to get the feel of the place.

title: Point is famous religiously however good place for adventure activities too.
review: Nice tracking point and very sirin & quite. Great scenery around. Best time to visit is early morning or 3-5 pm in evening. Cary own water bottle and bandages for safety. travel light.

title: Best valley view
review: Aweosme place to hang out with family and friends..

title: Good view
review: This is the only tourist place in Mukteshwar. The whole valley is visible from here.

title: Hyped Not Worth going
review: Muktheswar has limited places to visit or for leisure activities as compared to other places. This place is a small trek of about 2-2.5 km. There is a big hole in a rock which is being used by childless mothers to conceive & have a great significance on the day of Mahashivratri. Or you can just stare nature's beauty & click some photographs.

title: Scenic View!
review: Nice small trek in Mukteshwar to enjoy sunset. Would recommend going to temple then to pwd guest house and from there trek to Chauli ki jaali. While coming back trek down from another way leading towards temple.

title: Rock with a hole which holds religious beliefs.
review: The trek upto the view point is a slightly difficult and not suitable for elderly or small kids. The view from the top is good and on a clear day you can see snow clad peaks of Nanda devi. Sadly there was a lot of haze when we visited. We did a local guide who took INR 150 and explained us the historic and religious significance of the place.

title: makes you feeel on top of the world
review: it is located 2km from TRH Mukteshwar. it is very close to Mukteshwar Dham.One can cover both the places in one go. it is better to go to Chauli ki jaali first as the trek is of 200 m & is easy to moderate followed by an exciting forest trek where we saw snow & later proceeded to Mukteshwar Dham which is a steep incline & coming from Chauli ki jaali reduces the distance to almost half. you can cover the entire stretch in 1 hr to 1.5 hrs depending on your stamina.

title: Best Place view of Valley
review: Best place to get the scenic beauty of valley. Adventure activities like Zip Line, rappelling makes the place more suitable for youngsters.

title: View and activities
review: Great view point and good for photo clicking, and activities like rappling and rock climbing are adventurous when you are at such a height.

title: spectacular view
review: this is located near mukteshwar mahadev. the view is not of nandadevi, but valleys of nathuakhan and other villages. must visit

title: Amazing View
review: Great place to enjoy and take pictures. Very near to mandir.. we had a great walk as it was snow covered..

title: Beautiful Place
review: The place is awesome if you go there when temperature is mild to cold else you will burn yourself. The place is awesome with beautiful view and adventurous placing of the rocks to have to click some nice photos.

title: Beautiful Place
review: This place is not only scenic but also have religious values. We were told that during MahaShivRatri thousands of people visit this place. The surroundings are also worth seeing.

title: Beautiful Valley view.
review: A lot of adventure activities to do here, viz. rappelling, rock climbing, zip-line; and a beautiful view of the valley. At times, you may also get a view of Majestic Himalayan eagle. This place once used to be very calm and serene, but getting commercialized too quickly.

title: A must see place in Mukteshwar
review: Unique rocks that offer a near 360 degree view of Himalayan valleys of Kumaon. There are adventure sports like Zipline available.

title: Nice views!
review: Excellent views of the valley! If you enjoy a lil bit of rock climbing or rappling, this is the place to head to.

title: Nice, clean and spiritual
review: Its a beautiful place with a lovely walk which leads you to Chauli ki jali.. Loved valley crossing at decent prices.. very scenic.. loved hot maggie.. and enjoyed the walk to Shiv ji's temple.. Its better to hire a guide who lets you know the mythological stories attached to this place.. and behind big rocks surrounding the place..

title: Rocky Mountain with adventure sport
review: An ok sort of place to visit .. bit of adventure sport available....then only point available in muketeshwar

title: good adventure activity
review: its a small place which have a quiet a history now a days there are few adventure activities available there

title: Nice peaceful place !
review: Nice peaceful place. But please take care of kids there. Wonderful view of valley ! Be careful while clicking selfies !

title: Quick & easy Getaways !!
review: Mukteshwar as a destination has become very popular in the last couple of years also because of its easy accessibility from Delhi NCR. Oak chalet at Sargakhet remains a favourite hide out always !! Exceptional location, very good food and warm hospitality. The mountain sports at Chauli ki Jali are cheap and adventurous fun activity during your stay at Mukteshwar. Ofcourse the best time of the year is May June when its fruit season here but let me tell you winters is a beautiful chilling experience in itself. For one of those quick getaways Mukteshwar is an ideal spot.

title: Very good view of Mukteshwar
review: This place is on the way to Mukteshwar Temple by walking. but the view you can see is Awesome. But bit risky to take pictures from the rocks take care.

title: Good trek and adventure
review: Chauthi ki Jhali is a small trek from TRH resthouse and on the way gives amazing views of snow cladded peaks. It is recommended to have early morning trek for some Bird photography. Few adventure activities like rappeling are also conducted  for those interested in adventure. A nice trek through the woods you dont want to miss.

title: Get a Bird's eye-view with your feet on the ground
review: Chauli ki Jali at Mukteshwar is a unique spot that offers a superb panoramic view. Standing there you get a virtually aerial view of the mountain valley dotted with hill villages and terraced fields, with your feet firmly on the ground.

title: Hill Top in Mukteswar
review: it's top of the hill, which youngsters use to sit and get the photo and view of the city in the valley. Amazing Breathtaking view with total peace and silence. In January you might get snow as we were lucky to experience snow this January.

title: great views
review: it has nice views and walk is not much .  From the shiv temple you can easily walk to this place which has huge rocks and view of the valley is beautiful.

title: Nice View
review: The place provides a nice view of nearby mountains. There are also couple of adventure activities available here. The locals will tell you different stories about the place.

title: Must Visit
review: It's kind of the only place to visit in Mukteshwar. Offers excellent views and a peaceful environment.

title: So awesome place
review: Chauli ki jali is very awesome place in mukteshwar . If someone wants to see sunset and sunrise so... It is best place to see

title: Good place to View Sunset
review: Not far away from Mukteswar Bazaar on one side and the KMVN TRH on the other. Good place to view Sunset & adventure sports.

title: Visit to chauli ki jali
review: Amazing place to visit if you like nature. Sunset and sunrise is USP of the place.

title: Interesting rock formations with view of the valley
review: Chauli ki Jali is a short- 200 m hike from the KMVN TRH in Mukteshwar through a dense forest. You get a view of the other side of the valley- without the snow peaks from there. The cliffs themselves have been defaced by 'lovers' who wanted to leave their mark on history! Some adventure sports like rappelling, rock climbing are available there, though we did not try any. From there one can walk further to the Mukteshwar Dham.

title: Best place in Mukteshwar
review: The place is just amazing...! The veiw from here is just breathtaking. It is clean indeed..! One can also enjoy rock climbing here. It is truly a must visit place..!

title: a nice location for pics
review: You have a great view and a perfect place for pictures but apart from that not much here. reaching here requires a short and pleasant walk.

title: Amazing place
review: The place is amazing. Beautiful picturesque surroundings and the calmness of the place really soothed us. I would definitely visit again for this wonderful experience.

title: Great trek and awesome views
review: Chauli ki jali is just 1km trek. Can be done by anyone as it is not difficult. Once you reach, the place has great views from hilltop.

title: Awesome Himalayan ranges view
review: From Chauli ki jali you may watch a panoramic view of Himalayan ranges and you will enjoy if you are nature lover. Who do not enjoy to watch hill ranges, don't go there. If you are in Mukteshwar, you must visit this place.

title: Short trek, amazing view
review: A great place with nice views. One needs to walk for ~250m to reach this place but it's quite a lovely view. I sat here for some time just enjoying the views that were really great.

title: Just a hole in the rock.
review: May be it matters to those who have religious or cultural connection with it.  for the tourist, it is just s little hole in the rock, that will go unnoticed if no one tells you.

title: Chauli ki jali -Wonderful place
review: One of the best place if you are looking forward to have a panormic view of the mountain ranges ..A must visit spot .. the best time  to visit and  get the best view is either early morning or late in the evening (sunset)...For bidwatchers  AND photographers once again its a good spot to be in ....

title: Must visit place
review: Sunset from this point is most beautiful thing of this point and one who is visiting this place must have to wait for that moment

title: Spectacular view
review: One can reach the place after a short trek from where the vehicles stop. Its a rocky outcrop which juts out from the hill at a bizarre angle. One can climb on to the rock for a spectacular view of the kumaon hill ranges. On a clear day, one can see up to Almora and also Himalayas.

title: Only a rock
review: The place is nice for photography not ad "chauli ki jali" as there is a hole in a rock thats it!!!

title: Nice valley  !!!!
review: Very Nice valley in mukteshwar !!!!!!!!!!!! enjoyed very much with my friends i visit this place first time nd it was an wonderful experience .... if you visit mukteshwar vo should definitely visit this valley !!!!!!!!!!

title: Splendid view of the valley and surrounding peaks.
review: A moderate walk of around 500 m from the road head takes you to this place. The place affords amazing view of the valley and surrounding peaks. There are barren rock formations on which you will find names of modern day Laila and Majnu engraved. My salute to these lovers for there painstaking effort to make their love immortal. Quite a picturesque place and you will be tempted to click photographs from different angles. Do not venture close to the edges of the rocks because there is a vertical fall of hundreds of feet. From here you can walk upto the Mukteshwar temple.

title: Great adventures place
review: This place mainly known for sun set point and here u can do rock climbing rapelling and many adventures activity

title: Breathtaking views
review: The view from chauli ki jali is just amazing.  It is believed that shivji visited this place. Though the road till chauli ki jali is a bit tough but the views from chauli ki jali is really good.

title: Of treks, temple and panoramic views!
review: The drive to Mukteshwar turned out to be a pleasant one. Do take a Guide along with you on reaching the area as they are so knowledgeable about the flora and fauna of the area. Not only did we come to know of the local stories related to Chauli ki Jaali but also were able to identify some wild-flowers and trees ( poisonous and/or otherwise) The temple visit was also a pleasant one , clean and well managed.The panoramic vistas that is spread out are beautiful...the air clean! On the way up to Mukteshwar, remember to purchase local fruits like Pear, Apples and Plums from the villages sitting on the roadsides.

title: Great adventure
review: Good options for adults and kids alike. Adventure to its fullest. Rappling, rock climbing, zipline, archery , rope climbing.. Good variety

title: Zip lining on the rocks
review: this is a rocky outcrop behind the Mukteshwar dham reached by a gradual climb from its rear side.

title: Chauli ki jali
review: Amazin and thrilling experience..rock climbing n other activities were truely fun ..best location for photography aswell

title: Lovely view
review: Beautiful view and nice place to spend time in serene environment. In my earlier review I forgot name of this place and mentioned the practice of passing females through jali under mukteshwar temple, but this is the place where this practice is done on Shivratri according to local believe.

title: beautiful
review: was told by a friend to definitely visit the place.. It was worth going. the route to chauli ki jali its self adds beauty to the journey!

title: " Best place to visit in Mukteshwar "
review: Nice place to enjoy with friend's and family . awsm view of Himalayas from hear and many activities are also available to do like rock climbing , repling  and many more !!!!

title: Chauli Ki Jali
review: Beautiful View and serene place in Kumaon. Worth seen with awesome view. Mukeshwar temple is nearby and Chauli Ki Jali is just a walk away from this Temple.

title: Adventure all the way !
review: The region has a landscape I've not experienced or seen before - The cliffs are standing tall and high so one has to literally go till the edge to see the valley down below . And to top that is the mountain climbing and rappelling and zip line happening there - totally thrilling for the adventure enthusiasts and adrenalin junkies ! My son totally enjoyed all the activities and if one cannot do it then to watch  is also thrilling .

title: ActiviTY Centre of Mukteshwar
review: Try Flying fox at this place which is built between two mountain peaks overlooking nainital & himalayas can be viewed if you r Lucky !!!

title: nice place to visit
review: good place to visit,had few adventures like firefox etc good for a onetime short visit.I went there and saw people enjoying activities like ,the scene from the rocks was scary !! good for one time visit!!

title: The Thrill !!!!
review: The most amazing place I have ever been to. The view thrills you...literally. Tried sitting on the edge but elders stopped me so couldn't take pic, also known as the rock this is really the most beautiful view. People with vertigo should not try to stand on the rock edge...its scary to look down, you literally feel you are in the sky !

title: Good views and adventure
review: Decent place in Mukteshwar for some adventure. Otherwise it's a quaint and quiet town with natural beauty in abundance.

title: Great View Point
review: It was a small trek to Chauli Ki Jali, its an amazing view point & offers magnificent valley views. One must visit this place when in Mukteshwar. The temple in the same premises is a popular visitors destination.

title: Amazing view of valley!!!
review: And if you are man of steel you can try zip line here. 250 meters from the Mukteshwar temple this place is awesome. Loved it. Not safe for kids though.

title: Top of the city. .
review: Very nice you will be on the top of the mountain,  360 degree view. Amazing.  Mukeshwar temple is surrounded its oldest temple of lord shiva.

title: Must Visit for mountain lover
review: It is 55km from nainital. But i will say best place for mountains lover and there is Old Lord Shiva temple there. I loved this place.

title: Summer trip
review: This is a nice place with full natural scenes,, capture love moments here and enjoy the nature with classic view around.. There is one group of guys who provide rope ride. Must visit here in summer vacations.

title: Beautiful views
review: Chauli ki Jali is a rocky out crop overlooking an sheer drop of a few hundred feet and affording a beautiful panoramic view. One of Mukteswar's two must visits - the other being the Shiva Temple.

title: Nice Experience
review: One must visit this point it is a place which has many points to click pics and cannot miss the scenic beauty of the nature which feels calling you.

title: Nothing great about it
review: this is one of the few tourist spots in Mukteshwar. its name doesn't tell you anything, but essentially its just a cliff!

title: Jai Mata di
review: Chauli ki Jali, which is also known as Chauthi Jali is one of the famous tourist spots,located behind the cliff of Mukteshwar temple. Chauli ki Jali is a very famous tourist place which is a paradise for all the adventurous souls in Mukteshwar.Many people come to this place for enjoying rock climbing.

title: Nice Place for Valley Views and Family Time
review: It is the single tourist point in Mukteshware and really nice.A small, adventerous trek from Mukteshwar Mandir leads upto Chauli ki Jaali.

title: Superb View
review: Chauli Ki Jali is place just behind the Mukteshwar Temple hardly 100M far, Vallew view from here is great. Less crowded place.Plan a visit if you are in Mukteshwar town.

title: Family Soujourn on Mountain Ledge - Solo Interesting Tourist Place @ Mukteshwar
review: Nice place for good enjoying Valley views, Zipline experience, hot maggi in chilling breeze/ rain and clicking panoramic background for family pics

title: Scared of heights... this will take it away
review: Go on a bright sunny day....its a bliss. It sits high in the Kumaon Hills at an altitude of 2286 meters (7500 feet).

title: Mukteshwar temple
review: It was a whirlwind tour to Mukteshwar and was worth it. A very beautiful, lush green, pollution free and very silent place.

title: amazing view
review: awesome view to click selfies, almost looks like on top of the world, weather is always cool, this is nearby the shiva temple.

title: Just a random mountain
review: I went to Nainital with my family last weekend and we decided to go to Mukteshwar on 2nd day. It wasn't what I expected. It's just a random mountain, and chauli ki jali is nothing but a hole in a mountain. There are some adventurous activities like rock climbing, zipline and a temple. That's it. We wasted our 4 hours (to and fro nainital) to reach there and spend just 30min. If you're staying in Mukteshwar, you can consider going there, otherwise don't waste your time.

title: Sheer Rock
review: Chauli Ki Jaali is a mass of huge rock formation jutting out into the Kumaon valley just below the Mukteshwar Temple.

title: Great View
review: excellent view, located very close to the mukteshwar temple and should not be skipped. Can be covered in a day mukteshwar trip

title: Amazing place to relax
review: Just go there and relax, the view it provide is amazing and satisfying, has adventure activities so just chill out there.

title: Wonder of Nature.
review: You can either sit here and enjoy Maggie with a cold drink or go on a Zip line or simply admire the beautiful view of the valley below.

title: Good sunset view
review: It is a good place to relax and do some mountain sports such as rock climbing. Although there is nothing very special about this place, sunset view is excellent if there are no clouds. You may sit in the evening for half an hour and enjoy sunset in cool and calm surrounding.

title: Great View/Ziplining/250 meters trek from temple
review: A must for people who want to do Ziplining, its approx 15 mins basic trek from the temple.

title: MAGNIFICENT VIEW, INTERESTING FOLK TALES !!
review: This place is hardly 10-15 minute trek...but the view it offers is amazing. From here, one can see as far as human eye possibly could. And for the more adventurous people, it offers two kind of activities, one of them being rock climbing (the rock is really steep ;) )... I'd say a must visit !

title: scenic splendor
review: Very beautiful and awesome view of valleycan be seen from this place,  and one of the underrated tourist attraction nearby nainital, near there is old  lord shiva temple, as people says wishes of childless couple come true, also you can enjoy fox flying there which  is awesome experience as we got to pass through 100 feet deep valley , also the  season fruit  like plums , apricot and kaaphal was just awesome, if you are going in season like may-June you will find mukteshwar far less crowded and worth going than nainital

title: Natural cliff rock at a certain angle
review: It is the highest point at Mukteshwar. There is only the sky and clouds  above and thousands of feet of depth among the hills and trees below.A few adventure sport activities are carried out like rapelling , rock climbing etc. The rocks are tilted at a certain angle and that is its distinct feature. On a windy day you need to be careful there at the top to maintain your balance.The short walk from Mukteshwar temple from its left side where food vendors sit to Chauli ki jail is amazing amidst dense trees under which no sun rays can pass through and twining narrow road.

title: a sheer time waste
review: this has no significance but there is no other tourist attractions available. Carry your water and stick along for those with knee ailments. It a good walk first to temple and then to chauli ki jhali.

title: very good
review: beautiful view of himalayan range.    I would suggest everyone to visit to this place if someone is visiting mukteshwar

title: Must go place in mukteshwar!
review: This place offers a splendid view of the hills. Just six and relax if you want to, or you can try some adventure sports there. I guess its the highest point in mukteshwar.

title: what a view
review: going to Mukteshwar, do go upto lands's end at Chauli ki Jali. Climbing up the stairs to the Shiva temple in the evening and seeing the lights fade at day's end at this land's end is an experience that will never leave you.

title: Great views
review: Best way to reach is through trek and once u reach here ;u feel happy with the sights that behold you .

title: Quite interesting ...
review: Drive from Chanfi village to Mukteshwar was heavenly. Pine and deodar trees ,standing in line, welcome you. You get mesmerised by this unmatchable beauty of nature. To go to Chauli Ki Jali you have to walk a little on a narrow path which has on one side big rocks and on other side a valley. This place is quite interesting . A rock has a big hole and it is said that if one passes through this hole, all his wishes will come true. There are so many adventures sports.

title: Must Go
review: Its near to Mukteshwar Temple.Great place. This is a holy place and its very crowded in Shiv Ratri due to belief of this place.

title: Only go for an amazing view
review: it is small trek of 10 to15min from road with  two routes  one from the temple and other a little down the road  approx  300 m  if u want to be a little adventures take the second road it's through thick forest and a little  difficult not for people with knee problems or very small kids while the route from the temple is fairly easy with amazing view on clear day you get to see snow covered mountains

title: Thrilling
review: Not sure how this hole was created in the rocks. Leaving aside the follklore associated, it's a good place to visit & thrill for rock climbers etc.

title: nice view but otherwise regular
review: This place certainly had a lovely view . Besides that it is a regular place. One can find some chai and maggie stalls nearby and enjoy that :)

title: thrill...
review: nice place....do visit if you are seeking thrill. the place gives a panaromic  view of the valley.  nice quite place indeed

title: Nice small excursion in Mukteshwar
review: Mukteshwar doesn't have too many touristy places however Chauli Ki Jali is a nice place to visit. This places not just offers panoramic views of the mountains but also provide some little adventure sports.

title: Serenity
review: If you are looking for serenity, don't miss this place. It's awesome to say the least. Ensure you carry a mug of coffee and a book to read and believe me, you will find yourself in heaven.

title: Chauli ki Jali
review: it is just beneath the Mukteshwar Temple. Chauli ki Jali is famous for fulfilling wishes of those who doesnot have kids.

title: Never to miss
review: Chauli ki jali is a beautiful place with wonderful view of the valley. The walk from the temple is very exciting, it gives you a feeling of jungle track with silence & chirping of the birds only. There are many activities like zip lining, free fall, moutain climbing and many others for the people who loves adventures. The small chai wala serves wonderful ginger tea with maggie which adds up the to the exciting adventure all the more in the chilly weather. Overall a great experience and definitely never to miss the visit.

title: photo shoot location
review: from  temple parking area, a left small road around 100 meter will take u to this place. adventure activity were going on around 300/-

title: Must visit place
review: This place has amazing view. There agencies offering rappelling experience for a fee. Its a must see place for people looking for quiteness.

title: Must visit if you are in for some adventure sports
review: Take up valley crossing or raphling.... N do not miss the maggie feast near the rock and trek down on your own through the jungle route on the way to return.

title: Amazing panoramic view !!
review: The Chauli ki Jali is located very close to the Mukteshwar Dham temple. One can take a circle around the Mukteshwar Dham temple and the first attraction that one comes across if this place.

title: True to the name!
review: Mukteshwar is true to its name. A beautiful and quite place. This place will make you stay in Harmony with nature. Walking around this place is advised.chauli ki jali is OK to enjoy a little adventure sports. Going on a trek is best. There are loads of them with information on them on the internet.booking a cottage is better than staying in a resort . Weather at this time is pleasant and one would require something to keep warm at night. Not a lot of good places to eat.

title: nature's delight at the hill top
review: It's a natural rock structure at the top of a hill. a good place to spend some time. However, lack of security measures do make a bit open to accidents.

title: Amazing place
review: It is an amazing spot on the climb to the maukteshwar temple. The views of the mountains and valleys are amazing. Must visit.

title: nice trek with beautiful view
review: The trek was lovely and view was awesome, one can see snow capped mountains. The terrain is rocky and story attached to it intriguing.

title: chauli ki jali
review: chauli ki jali is basically a hole in a mountain with great natural view and it is a religious value also .woman go through in this hole in hope of kids

title: Incredible view
review: The view is breath taking. This is a short walk behind Mukteshwar temple and worth it. The pine and deodhar trees of the forest make the place very serene

title: Breathtaking views
review: There's a folklore around this place best told by a local :-). Views of the mountains from here is breathtaking. If you are staying at Mukteshwar, try going here very early morning. Since it's a tourist place, it gets really crowded.

title: Fascinating experience!!!
review: Chauthi Ki Jaali, one of the famous tourist spots, is located on a cliff in Mukteshwar.Just 50 km/s from Nainital but the route and destination both are really worth visiting once once in lifetime. Dotted with lush green surroundings and numerous rocks, the site is renowned for offering beautiful views of the Kumaon valley. The natural lattices and a hole in the rock are fascinating.The site is frequently thronged by devotees and tourists as it is believed that women are blessed with children if they touch these lattices. The trek to this place is an excellent experience,it will feel like inside a dense forest and cold air blowing with ultimate views on the way. In the middle you will also get adventures activities options like rope climbing etc.Tourists can also engage themselves in mountain climbing and rappelling activities that are regularly organised at the site.

title: Place to Hangout with Friends
review: Chauli Ki Jali is view point in Mukteshwar and a perfect place to hangout with friends. Just be careful of the height and the rocky edges.

title: Combination of peace and adventure
review: A perfect combination of peace and adventure for people of all ages! Right next to the Mukteshwar temple and atop a hill, a perfectly beautiful spot offering great views of the Himalayan range.

title: Crowded but beautiful
review: Nice view but it's pretty crowded around this time of the year! And there is no rock without a name carved on it!

title: Average place...not really worth if you are not into mountain-climbing!
review: Very Average place, the path being next to one of the best temples of Mukteswar. I would rather suggest not even going there, if you are not into mountain-climbing and adventurous sports.

title: Good view point
review: Lots of mountains are visible from here, visit once if you are in mukteshwar. You will find maggi point there with lots of visitors coming there and clicking their photos.

title: Excellent scenic view
review: In view of limited sightseeing places, this is the one of the main place where one can relax, click memories of his visit and feel the nature.

title: Nice place but overhyped
review: This is certainly not be missed if you're in mukteshwar but ironically you'll not miss too much if you miss this! Good place with activities taking place (not sure how professionally managed though, so indulge at your own risk). Apart from that views are good as it is at the top. Cleanliness is a bit of concern, I wish we could teach that lesson to some illiterate tourists.

title: for best view of vally and sunset
review: this is the must-to-do visit if in mukteshewar. great valley sightings along with one of the best sunset you can experience

title: Chauli-ki-Jali,
review: Close to it lie the overhanging cliffs, locally known as Chauli-ki-Jali, used for rock climbing and rappelling, with an excellent view of the valleys below. and sunset sunset view point

title: breath taking view
review: loved this place for its breath taking view. one of the few must visit places in mukteshwar. with clear sky one can have clear view of himalayas

title: Good location to view Himalaya
review: Choli ki jali seems to be over killed by its fame, people have spoiled the whole place but still this is the best location to look the Vally on left side and right side it's very scenic , u must go this place when in mukteshwar

title: scenic beauty
review: great hight adventure sports like mount climbing rappling  etc are available windy location scenic beauty of mountains and green belt

title: Great View of Snow covered Himalayas
review: This place called Chauli Ki Jali situated just beside Mukteshwar Dham.

title: Must Watch
review: Lovely place, breathtaking view. Out of the world feeling. If interested rock climbing facility is available.

title: Nature's Marvel
review: Chauli Ki Jaali is a natural rock face on a steep mountain slope. It gives a bird's eye view of the splendid valley down below.

title: Beautiful views
review: This spot has a very unique geography, with jutting cliffs offering beautiful views of the valley in one side, and the Nanda Devi parvat range on the other. Ideal for rock climbing and rappelling, one can spend fun time here under the warm sun and crisp cool air. Ideal for day visit.

title: worth a visit
review: This place has a breathtaking view, a great folk tale about it and a mind-boggling drop down from the edge to watch and wonder about.

title: Visit, if in Mukteshwar
review: Must visit if in Mukteshwar. 2 parallel foot road 1 towards Mukteshwar Temple another going towards chauli ki jail. 1 to 1.5 km walk to reach the spot. It is actually a whole on the steep rock  from where women used to pass through in the hope of baby.

title: Splendid View
review: Good trek to the view point. Should Ideally prefer a clear sunny day to have get the splendid view of the valley.

title: Suicide point !!
review: Chauli ki jali is just about 500 mtrs walk from the Mukteshwar temple.

title: Stunning sunset from these cliffs.
review: Beautiful views and amazing sunset from these cliffs.

title: Indulge in Adventure
review: you can do all this out there - Rapling, Rock Climbing, Flying Fox, with the amazing view of Himalayas in the backdrop, freezing air... it is amazing..

title: Mesmerising!
review: If you are in a 500 kilometre radius and a sucker for panoramic views, you should totally come here. It's a great place to click selfies. There you can do activities like Rock Climbing but it can get terrifying as it is on a really good height. The walk, one will have to do in order to reach here is really beautiful. It's a peaceful and quiet place.

title: Average Hills
review: Chauli-Ki-Jali is nothing but cliffs on top of hills jutting out slantingly towards a valley below from where we can see the valley,the sun set, the flying eagles etc. It can be easily approached through a pathway, from the main road, near Government Primary School. This natural rock formation is around 250 metres  from the main road. Tourists staying at TRH KMVN can also reach Chauli-Ki-Jali from the rear side of the KMVN. through an undefined, but walkable,'Kuttcha' pathway, during day time. Visits to Chauli-Ki-Jali is recommended during day time only (personal opinion). Few local people offer facilities to tourists to indulge in rock climbing, darting, rappeling, but do at your own risk as they are all unregistered/ uncertified.

title: Great views
review: An amazing expanse if mountains. Sharp drops. Great adventure sports. Good maggi stalls.

title: Nice Panoramic View
review: Although there is nothing so special about the place, but if you get quiet time at the jutting rock yes you can enjoy panoramic view. The view in morning or evening are mesmerizing. Worth spending some time.

title: Beautiful view from chauri ki Jaali
review: Extremely photogenic views can be seen from this point. Beautiful asfalt rocks glittering all around. Also ranges of himalayas can be seen from this point. Apple and pear gardens on the way to mukteshwar is another attraction.

title: Chauli Ki Jali
review: Good view and a nice place to see rock formations. You'll also get a   good chance to see garden lizards basking in the sun.

title: nice view
review: amazing mountain view.. around 7500 ft high from MSL. the natural rock formation hanging tip gives thrilling experience.

title: chauli ki jali
review: chauli ki jali is basically a hole in a hill from where woman passes in the hope of having child .from here you can enjoy awesome view of nature

title: Nice views
review: Nice views from the location... was interested to decode the meaning of Chauli ki Jali, on seeing the actual Jali, felt little dissapointed

title: Can't miss that!!
review: If you have been this is must visit place there. You can just sit for hours there in evening. Some good spots for photographers.

title: Perfect place to make you happy..... never miss this.
review: It is very interesting place, you get excellent view of the valley. Mountains, clouds and beyond...the view is absolutely superb. Just sit on the cliffs and enjoy the sunset. It is a must visit place.

title: Must visit
review: Easy to reach and lovely views.. this is also the place for enjoying rappelling and rock climbing. Very close to the Mukteshwar Dham temple.

title: Adventure activity
review: Good site for adventure activities. Flying Fox, rappelling, rock climbing. There is a fair scope of bargaining the price. It was 300/- per activity. we bargained for 200/- per activity.

title: Place with great view
review: The views were spectacular. It was bit crowded. I would have loved to sit there alone for some with my thoughts.

title: Sunset over Chauli ki Jali
review: Amazing sunset views - while standing on 1000 year old petrified wood. We stood on the edge of a steep drop off and watched the sun set over the Himalayas - almost a spiritual experience. A must do!

title: amazing view of the valley
review: we visited the mukteshwar siv temple and saw the Chauli ke Jali on the way, its a hole in the cliff on the mountain ledge and the locals believe that by going up and down from this hole three times on shivrati can bless a childless woman with a child.

title: Jutting rock and folklore...
review: Amazing view and complete feeling of you being you standing at the corner of the falling earth...Love the view from the end

title: Very nice place with cliffs.
review: Nice cliffs. Awesome place to take photos with friends. Some adventure activities are also available. There is an option to go on a small trek from the side of the main temple (mukteshwar) and go to clifs, follow a trekking area to reach mandir.

title: At a hight of 2000 ft, must visit
review: A peaceful place to spend with you loved ones.Its a nice place n good for people who love adventure,.

title: Rock Climbing
review: Must visit Place who is adventures it is at very high altitude and you need courage to look below in the valley lot of foreigners and Indians come for rock climbing and also the couple who is not having child they come for blessings

title: Amazing Views
review: It is an interesting place that offers excellent view of the valley. Mountains, clouds and beyond...the view is absolutely superb. Just sit on the cliffs and enjoy the sunset. It is a must visit place.

title: Best for PANO pics
review: This spot in Mukteshwar is amazing but if ur scared of heights ..its not for u ..wear sport shoes for a comfortable trek u can get amazing pics for FB uploads :-P

title: was gud
review: scary but good....the scenic beauty is awesome...the walk was good and the hill shafts are a beauty.....................................................................awesome

title: Must visit for its views outstanding place
review: Must visit for its views outstanding place. This place has the best views i have ever seen . Sheer drop of mountains is grt . Adventure activities also happen here.

title: mesmerizing
review: One of the best places to get a great view of the Himalayas. The rocks jut out and its a magical place.

title: Serene beautiful place
review: its a great place to be with yourself , windy and huge expanse of scenery in 180 degrees. immense drop so be very careful if you are with kids.

title: Mesmerising Horizon
review: Good valley view of the surrounding mountains and scattered villages with open sky and mesmerising horizon.

title: Rock climbing + rapelling
review: Breathtaking view of the valley at sunset, along with an opportunity to experience rock climbing and rapelling. There are two levels of rock climbing / rapelling here: 35 feet and 85 feet. If this is your first time there (like me), I would suggest doing the 35 feet first, then the 85 feet.

title: Good view from here
review: the place is at around 7500 feet above sea level and is bretahtaking with amazing views of the himalayan range. One can take part in rappelling, rock climbing and valley crosssing activities in thsi region. The entire area is rocky with ample opportunities to explore teh terrain on your own. The place gets chilly and windy in winter . One shoudlw ait for some good sunset views too.

title: Mukteshwar - Jun 2015
review: This is must visit if you are and staying at Mukteshwar. It is small walk beside Mukteshwar temple. The panorama from here is also very beautiful. You can try a bit of rock climbing here as well. Visit this place in the afternoon before sunset. The sunset from Chauli Ki Jali on a clear sky is just spectacular.

title: Breath taking view of Himalayas
review: Breath taking view of himalayas.... Must see the sunset at Chauli ki jaali. I was lucky to have stayed at Mystic Mukteshwar, the owner drove us there n also played our guide, explaining about the area. Its short walk (trek), say about 120-150 m after car parking ( right next to the temple). During the day, there are adventure sports, like rock climbing available( though i dint do it).

title: Nice Place
review: Its a nice place for some activities like valley crossing, rock climbing, rappelling etc.. temple is also nice.

title: Rapple Jali
review: It was a breathe taking view and experience had gone  on a official team outing and did one of the team building exercises out here... Its a fantastic place and awesum weather

title: A famly trip
review: Need to track for about 10-15 minutes from Mukteshwar Mahadev Temple. To reach temple, there are about 500 steep steps from car park. From there, a smooth track to Chauli Ki Jaali.. can be managed by senior citizens who walks. You would get a good scenic view from Chauli Ki Jaali. Some sports activity and a tea/snacks stall. This is one of main tourist point in Mukteshwar.

title: Amazing Cliff and the View from Here
review: This is a natural rock formation on the cliff side. The trek to this interesting place starts right next to the famous Mukteshwar temple. It is a small trek of 10-15 minutes and then you reach this magnificent spot.  The view of the valley from here is interesting.

title: Only good view point in Mukteshwar
review: It's a good one time go, being in mukteshwar you really have very less options for sigh seeing. View Point was nice but nothing great about it.

title: Stupendofantabulous !!! ❤ ❤ ❤
review: WoW !!! What a wonderful place !!!

title: Definitely visit if you go to see the Mukeshwar temple
review: Quick walk away from the Mukteshwar temple. Good for getting a nice view of the valley. Saw folks trying out things like the flying fox (Rope based activity) which looked like fun. Chauli ki Jali itself is a tad difficult to get to, but good fun if you fancy a bit of trek.

title: Amazing trip to Mukhteswar ..beautiful stay at Trinetra orchards
review: It was very scenic   Thg we were tired after the stair walk to the j ukhteswar dhar temple

title: Superb !
review: The place has religious significance and has a beautiful temple. Adventurous guys should not miss out clicking a picture at the cliff and try their hands on rock climbing & rappelling.

title: Adventure Sports in Uttarakhand....
review: If you visit Mukteshwar, you have to visit this place as it shall give a thrilling adventure sports experience for kids and adults alike.....

title: Superb place
review: Its a nice place n good for people who love adventure...U can seat on rocks n enjoy mesmerizing view from top.....must visit place

title: Good view
review: Nice place to click pics.

title: Temple and beyond
review: Venture there if you like a thrilling experience and are not afraid of heights.  No proper guidance or protection or warning signs from the administration.

title: A serene place
review: Nice place to spend your evening and watch the sun go down. It is cool and bereey even in peak summers

title: Must Visit in Mukteshwar
review: I am mostly an adventure lover and have been to many mountain regions, so the excitement level wasnt that great at Chauli ki Jali. But considering there isn't much that you could do in Mukteshwar, this turns out to be a must visit if you are in Mukteshwar. Good place to take pictures, good enough to spend about an hour or so.

title: Adventure sports
review: unsafe...non certified people organizing adventure sports. not recommended. the view is great from here though

title: Nice place to be
review: A short trek uphill takes you to a beautiful place, open 3 sides with fantastic picturesque rock hanging formations. What is in extra - you can do rappelling and other few adventure sports here. Sunset was beautiful.

title: Picturesque View.
review: Chauli ki Jali and Mukteshwar temple are near by. So take the forest trek (which is very safe, and enjoyable)  route and visit chauli ki jali and this route will end up to the temple. After visiting the temple one can come down through the stairs. It will also save one time stairs.

title: Sheer Rocky Cliff.
review: A beautiful place near Mahadev temple. The hanging rocks provide a breath taking view of the valley and the steep fall bellow.They have activity like Rappling and rock climbing available for adventure lovers and kids.You can cling down from one side to see the strange rock formation from side below.

title: A good sightseeing place in Mukteshwar with a Picturesque View!
review: CHauli ki Jaali is a sightseeing place near Mukteshwar, which is a relief to the eyes. You get to see the entire Nainital view from top of the cliff.

title: Nice thrilling view
review: Chauli ki Jali is situated just behind Mukteshwar temple and is good for activities like Rock Climibing and Valley Crossing. One can also enjoy Himalayan view from here and breath taking view of the valey below.

title: must see
review: beautiful place...the fallen trees have undergone a process called petrification and turned to stone

title: An adventurous place
review: Nice place near the dham temple offering good valley views and lot of trees. There are adventurous activities that can be done like river crossing and rappelling.

title: Best place to visit in Mukteshwar
review: Chauli ki jaali was absolutely brilliant! Must visit for everyone. The view from the height, the adrenaline rush, everything was perfect

title: visit to chauli ki jaali
review: It was a nice walk from the base of the Mukteshwar temple. Chauli ki Jaali has some religious significance but we did not explore the same. We walked around casually and it was a nice experience.

title: Panoramic view
review: Till you reach the place, you don't realize the beauty it beholds. You suddenly find yourself on a hilltop facing a huge Himalayan range and a deep valley in front of you. People fearing heights can really have their heart pumping. Locals say that  a hole in the stone there is being crossed by the brides for getting a child though it seems to difficult to trudge. Whatever it may be, but it's a beautiful place witha fantastic view.

title: Rocky adventure
review: One of the important landmarks in Mukteshwar Town.A must visit place if you are interested in Adventure sports

title: Visual Delight and Nature's Wonder
