review: Amazing nature rock formation which seems to have been shot in couple of hindi films also. Probably one of the best panoramic view of Himalayan Mountains. There are some adventure activities available here. Best view is probably on a clear day when one can see snow capped mountain. Worth a visit

title: Amazing place
review: This is really awesome place to visit. This is situated at highest peak of mukteshwar, the view of hills and valleys are amazing. Adventure activities are arranged here..like Stone climbing,fox flying.. It is really a good place to visit.

title: long walk to a valley view
review: you have to take a long walk to reach here...there are lot of stories about the place but actually, it is just a spot from where you get a panaromic view of the valley and mountains...adventure activities done here are by non professionals and extremely risky

title: Good
review: Adventure sports

title: Great place for a holiday
review: try to hire the services of guide Ramesh to discover the hidden places not to be missed in mukteshwar . mobile no. ramesh - 07409366169

title: Reminds you of Pride Rock From  "The Lion King"
review: It's a rocky outcrop overlooking the valley where you're treated to splendid views of the surrounding hillsides. You could also try rappelling, rock climbing, flying fox, and even try your hand at being Oliver Queen by shooting a few arrows at a fixed target. Provides enough entertainment to last an entire morning :-)

title: Fun walk to chauli ki jali
review: I went there with my family along with relatives and their family . fortunately I was at at KMVN rest house which is only 200 meter away from this place . its an easy walk to that place and I just walked there with kids  passing through beautiful trek and we all enjoyed it fully . we went there twice in a day as hotel was close by . we found lots of activity around that place like flying fox , rappelling , rock climbing organized by some group of people . a temporary tea stall was there but no permanent structure or facility around and I liked that part :) .  one can go and picnic to that place with beautiful view around . one can enjoy sunset if not cloudy :)

title: beautiful place
review: This place gives u good view of sunrise n sunset . Here we enjoy some adventurous sports . its a beautiful place to see the Himalayan range.

title: Nice rock formations
review: Spend some time with nature in the company of majestic rock formations jutting out.  Lie and see the valley below or rappel down the rocks.  Simply awesome!!!

title: thrilling
review: adventure activities in plenty. visit to mukteshwar is nothing without this spot & shiva temple. KMVN rest house is best located nearby.

title: A fun experience! Don't miss if you're in Mukteshwar
review: A sheer drop. Dangle your legs from the precipice and watch the tops of the himalayan foothills in all their splendour.

title: Nice sunset point
review: Visit this place in evening to enjoy sunset.

title: Excellent
review: Wonderful and thrilling place visited by adventure seeking people with great view of hills and valleys

title: Worth a visit.
review: Its a view point. When we went the weather was soooo awesome. Mukteshwar has an old, small, english town charm.

title: good for photography only
review: view is awesome but not food point. location is not that big you can roam around. now the reviewer wnats me to write 100 word. but i am able to define this location in 100 words. but i can say it is the only place in mukteshwar to watch.

title: integral part of your visit to mukteshwar
review: this is like the one and only places in mukteshwar to visit apart from the temple. there are really good sport activities like flying fox and repelling. they are done from a pretty good height so you may get goosebumps but they give you a memory that will be there for your lifetime.

title: Good place
review: You get good pictures clicked if you go there between noon & evening. One can have some adventure with rock climbing. Guides & people are there to help you.

title: Pretty Valley
review: It's a nice valley view while going to the temple. That's about it. There isn't much to it.

title: Stunning view with some great adventure activities!
review: I visited Mukteshwar with my college group and Chauli ki jali was one of the best parts about the entire trip! I was in love with the place right from the very beginning as it had some stunning views of the himalayas along with some great adventure activities which kept us occupied for most of the day. The adventure activities included Rock climbing, Rappelling and flying fox.Its definitely a must visit for all the adventure buffs!

title: Beautiful, but ..
review: The view from these rocks is breathtakingly beautiful and these rocks themselves are a neat feature. But they have been marred by people coming and writing their names in stone with a chisel.

title: fantastic Mukteshwar
review: lovely place and a place to click lot of photos.

title: get over your fer of heights
review: The sheer drop you see while clambering over the rocks at Chauli ki Jaali is truly breathtaking. Very nice 270 degree views

title: good place
review: Valley view is free. If you are interested in paid entertainment then you can do archery, rappelling and valley crossing

title: Worth a visit
review: Breathtaking views coupled with fun outdoor activities, made this small trek worth it. Its a must visit, because of the sheer altitude you get to experience and i can't say enough about the views that one gets to see!

title: Awesome location
review: Awesome location. one can go bizzare admiring the views and clicking snaps. Its the edge of hte peak and offers beautiful clicking opporutnity. Time flies here, as one never realises the amount of time spent at each of the little mounts

title: Wonderful Panoramic VIew
review: Easily the best attraction of Mukteshwar. This place gives a breathtaking view of the Mukteswar township and adjoining range of hills. The unique protrusion of rocks resembles the shape of fire from a chulha.

title: very good
review: nice adventures place know as sucude point excellent views of himalayas  for eating maggi point is available

title: Close to heaven
review: Serine beauty. peaceful place. feels like heaven. out of the world. This is a place where you must visit atleast once

title: Beautiful view
review: You need to sit on the rock ledge overlooking the valley to realize why this is a fantastic spot.

title: A place to just sit and admire nature
review: When here, I just sat on a rock ledge just overlooking the valley and realized why this place is so amazing. Once seated, I got breathtaking views below of the valley and continued to sit for a long time admiring nature, I am sure even you will do the same when you are here.

title: Breathtaking views
review: The place has breathtaking views as most of the other hill stations. But this one is special because of the view of the Himalayan ranges on a clear sunny day. The only thing i did not like was the rock where Romeos carve their name on the rock like 'Raju loves Shilpa' and 'Monu only for you'. Very funny indeed.

title: Incredible view of Sunset
review: I have visited Mukteshwar many times and quite impress with its stunning natural beauty & peace. There are very few places in India from where one can see Sun Rise and Sun Set both, Mukteshwar is one of them. Apart from that Mukteshwar provides very wide view of Snow covered peaks of Himalayan Range (2700 Approx.)

title: awesome......
review: everything is to like take some snacks its walking distance from main mandir ,PWD and KMVN.

title: Scenic View all around !!
review: Being at the location, you will be surround by beautiful scenic views!! Perfect location for outdoor shoot !!

title: Its a trek worth experiencing
review: The walk thru the woods to Chauli ki jali. On the way you will find some organised adventure sports guy offering you rapelling. However, the Chauli ki jali is a natural wonder and a great place to take photographs

title: Amazing
review: The beautiful view like a picture postcard is really amazing... A must visit place... To reach this point, it is better to take the jungle route to the Mukteshwar temple than to go to the temple directly through the stairs... A nice choice to take the pics...

title: The Edge of the world
review: The best view I've seen in years...

title: Great place to see Sun set.
review: Place where adventure seekers can try Rock climbing, Flying Fox etc. Try to keep the place clean and advice others too. Trek from here to PWD /KVMN Guest house.

title: Worth a visit
review: You can enjoy a little walk in the jungle. CLick pictures near the rocks. Nice view of Almora & Himalyas.

title: rock formation having hole in between
review: it is sort of rock formation having hole in between the rocks. its situated near the mukteshwar temple , it is one of the tourist attraction in mukteshwar

title: Worth a visit
review: A quaint, old place within a deep jungle; worth a visit. Beware of the pandits hovering all over...and do ahve the fresh fruit juice sold around the place

title: Do Look Down
review: A natural rock formation jutting out of the mountain side giving a fantastic view of the sheer drop below. Sadly defaced by people who have carved their names on the rock face. Must visit if in the area.

title: Breathtaking views
review: This is the place to do rock climbing and rappelling in Mukteshwar. Breathtaking view from the cliff

title: it's nice
review: it's nice view....panoramic view of the hills from the top..! it's more like the staple suicide points in hills station but overall...it's worth going once...u'll get good clicks...!

title: Peaceful & Tranquil
review: The cool breeze (that too in the month of June) and the location of the place is really great. It is a good break from the polluted city air! Also, the sight of a jaali in the mountain is quiet unique

title: 7500 ft abv sea level...truly amazing
review: If you are on a adventure trip in Uttarakhand, then do visit this place. Group packages available for Rappelling & rock climbing. Get a professional to plan a trekking expedition within Mukhteshwar & explore the wilderness in full swing

title: Quite an experience!!
review: As Mukteshwar is a small place...if you are going there- Chauli ki Jali is one of the must go places.

title: Makes you want to Basejump....Amazing Panorama
review: Chauli ki Jhali as it is called is a very high cliff face a small walk from the Mukteshwar Maharaj temple in IVRI campus.

title: Amazing view of the mountains
review: We did lot of outdoor activities so loved the place. It has an amazing view! You will love sitting there, read a book or just gaze at the valley!

title: Rappelling & Rock climbing
review: Looking for adventure..... with safety....chauli ki jali is a must visit... a nice 15mt trekk to the top of the mountain.

title: its wonderful treck
review: the track is alongside a rock cliff... its wonderful. the view after reaching on top is breath taking. gives heavenly feeling. a must for all.

title: Excellent Sunset Point
review: We saw one of d most beautiful sunsets from here. One can try rappelling, there r guides available. A very beautiful place.

title: Beautiful nature
review: The view of Himalayas was amazing.we just sat there for an hour and enjoyed the view.I didn't like the way tourists had thrown the wrappers all around inspite of so many dustbins provided by administration at all the places.

title: Nothing special
review: The place is nothing but a hilltop with a nice view. There are some rocks which looks good on pics. People who regularly visits hills and mountains will not find any novelty.

title: Amazing place for adventure and nature lovers
review: Its a wonderful place! Apart from activities like valley crossing, rock climbing, and rappelling, its a great scenic place. The out-grown set of rocks is itself a must see. The views of the sprawling valleys and mountain ranges are so enchanting that you can spend hours sitting just looking downwards. I think it was the highlight of our trip and those few hours that we spent there are a memory for life.

title: Peaceful Place with great views
review: Beautiful and peaceful place to watch the sunset. View of the valleys is excellent and depending on the weather you can see clouds stuck in the valley or mist. Rock formations are very interesting here.

title: serene
review: super like must visit and green cover is mesmerising.you can do rappelling, rock climbing..archery and  flying fox.

title: True Valley View..
review: The views are excellent from here...must visit if you are in the area..

title: Average
review: Well, it is worth a visit if you are in Mukteshwar especially after or before a visit to the temple.

title: Beautiful spot completely destroyed by tourists and locals..
review: Too much of dirt and plastic.. engravings done by people all around.. but good views from the cliffs.. Something you can avoid though.. you feel sorry after seeing all the plastic thrown around.

title: Short easy hike to adventure sports
review: There is a path to the left of where steps for Mukteshwar temple begin which takes one to chauli ki jali. It is well marked and there are plentiful guides who want to take you there. I didn't see the logic of using one and didn't. Ultimately I didn't go all the way to chauli ki jali as the adventure activities en route completely enticed me. Did archery with arrows that shoot at such speeds I felt for the first time how they are used to kill animals. Also did the flying fox which is basically me suspended with ropes and buckles and sliding across to a rock formation. One has to hike back from there at the end. Totally brilliant! Though not for the faint of heart.

title: Chauli ki Jali - Darr ke aage :).....
review: The Sheer Fall when viewed from the top of the jali is breathtaking and nerve wrecking at the same time !

title: Adventure
review: It is a cliff which is few hundred metres away from Mukteshwar Mahadev temple. it is agood place and you can see hudreds of metre down. There are many paied activities like pappling, rock-climbing, fox crossing.

title: Good place for Adventure Activity
review: apart from famous temple one can try their adventure skiils, they have lots of adventure activities like Rappling, Rock Climbing, Zip Line etc. But these activities needs to be arranged in advance with the help of Hotel staff you stay in.

title: Adventure
review: The area is a stony with deep looking depths. The area provides many adventurous activities like rappelling,fox-climbing etc. The area is good for different view of the near by areas.

title: Good activity if you take the entire circuit
review: Take the route through the forest next to the circuit house and be careful when you traverse the rocks around the Chauli Ki Jali

title: great view.
review: excellent view of the dhauladhar range and nice adventure activities. the edge is a perfect place to sit and enjoy the serene view. rappeling and archery are available for the adventure loving people.

title: Beautiful sereny
review: The place is a cliff at the feet of Mukteshwar temple and is a good place to see sunrise and sunset. The place provides tourist a chance to have the fun of adventurous activities like rock-climbing, fox flying, rappelling etc.

title: Easy hike to rocky outcrop with scenic views
review: A visit to Mukteshwar would be incomplete without a visit to Chauli Ki Jali.

title: Breathtaking view and cliff drops ..
review: Cliffhangers would love this place. A spot for rock climbers and rappellers, this is very close to the Mukteshwar temple (again a temple situated on top of a ridge with a beautiful pathway lined with oaks) and a 270 degree view of the hills.

title: Must visit in Mukteshwar
review: good place if you wish to do some hiking rock  climbing. Excellent view of the valley below. The drive to the point is something you should not miss.

title: Nice place for adventure activities
review: Rocky mountain patches where you can do rock climbing for the entire day (if you have that much energy). You can also do rappelling. I have heard that you can now also do para sailing from this spot.

title: should go there if you are in mukteshwar
review: nice place but nothing much to do there...

title: Excellent View of Sunset
review: Be there before Sunset, so that you can see the complete sunset along with the excellent view of Himalaya.

title: Skyfall
review: It is was like your seeing a another world which is deep down below. Very good place for sun-set and sun-rise.

title: Do the adventure thing
review: We did Flying Fox and the 'real' Archery and would have liked to climb the rock face too,

title: Mukteshwar is must visit for easiest Himalayan ranges view.
review: Mukteshwar is must visit for easiest Himalayan ranges view. Go from September onwards till March your view will be un obstructed to panchachuli and Nandadevi. Stay at KMVN

title: good views from there
review: The trail and location is very good but there should be some public toilets there. The condition of heritage building there is very critical

title: Adrenaline Rush..........
review: Abseiling at this spot will sure get you Adrenaline Rush............ Cliff is so attractive that adventure lovers cannot think to leave it. This point offers beautiful view  of snow clad Himalayas and Valley. Nearby there is forest. where one can go for forest trek. It is really awesome..

title: Chauli ki Jali
review: Amazing view of Almora and Nainital.

title: Chauli ki Jali
review: This was during our visit in May 2011. Vikram from Trishul Orchard had organised Rock Climbing, Rappling and Flying Fox here and boy was it fun!!!!!
